text: Left of the Isar, Right of the Spree () is a 1929 German silent film directed by Franz Seitz. It was made at the Emelka Studios in Munich. The film's sets were designed by Ludwig Reiber. A 1940 film was made with the same title. ==Cast== In alphabetical order ==References== ==Bibliography== * ==External links== * Category:1929 films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:Films directed by Franz Seitz Category:German silent feature films Category:Bavaria Film films Category:Films set in Munich Category:German black-and-white films Category:Films shot at Bavaria Studios
title: Left of the Isar, Right of the Spree (1929 film)
